content:
ThreadMessageEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that handles the ThreadFilterMessage and ThreadPreprocessMessage events.

In this Article

public delegate void ThreadMessageEventHandler(ref MSG msg, ref bool handled);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
ThreadMessageEventHandler
